body.name: Krisler Adjustable Threaded Bed Frame Anti-Shake Tool, Headboard Stoppers, Bedside Headboards Prevent loosening Anti-Shake Fixer, Easy Install (30-112mm)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 18 mins
features: Improve the Quality of Your Sleep: If you think that a Moving bed would not affect your sleep, you might want to think again! In fact, without bed frame anti shake tool, bed always squeak while you're trying to sleep! We made it!
Wall Protection: EVA cushion effectively reduces noise and protects your wall from damage, Prevent the head of the bed from becoming wobbly.
Easy to Install: Our threaded glides screw into place and can transform your bed frame in minutes, Make your bed more stable.

Variouse Use:This Adjustable Threaded Bed Frame anti-shake tool can be used in many places, as long as the center of gravity is unstable or easy to shake the object can be used. Such as bed, cabinet, chair, sofa and other objects used against the wall.
Warm Tips:Measure the distance between your shaking furniture and the wall, then choose the right size Adjustable Threaded Bed Frame anti-shake tool to hold it in place.
body.description: EARTHQUAKE BED STOPPER HEADBOARD PAD Anti-SHAKE & REDUCE NOISE The headboard stabilizer without drilling into walls or head boards.Tear off the red film of the metal base and stick it on the headboard, and then the side of the EVA pad is twisted by hand until it is against the wall. EVA cushion to reduce noice Strong & sturdy screws Super sticky glue ensures firmness

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really easy to install. They come with an adhesive on the end that mounts to the back board of the bed, but you also have the option to mount the stoppers with screws (not included), overall really good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My headboard has always annoyed me. It's just never secure. These work great! Now, my headboard is secure. Great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These work fine.
reviews.reviewText: These are great. Easy to use. Only drawback is really not strong enough stickiness to hold tightly onto things. But that means you can reposition , if necessary. Also, there are screw holes if you want to really permanently put them on your furniture. Otherwise, the pressure likely keeps them in place. I do wish I hadn’t waited so long to get these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I put it on my bookshelf as the bottom portion is closer to the wall than the top portion. The quality is very good for these. Does not rock at all towards the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a Miracle, But Definitely Help
reviews.reviewText: Well, what can I say? We have a wobbly bed frame with a decent size headboard. We worked around this and then purchased these in hopes miracles would happen. In truth, they take the edge off and don't seem to cause any damage (in fact, they may keep some damage from happening). We kept them because they do help keep things calm, but just don't expect the best thing since sliced bread.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use... if you don't want your bed scraping your wall or making noise when you... these are great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for desk. No more shaky desk or wobbly Zoom calls!
reviews.reviewText: I had tried many many things to make my home office desk more sturdy - - on Zoom calls my camera would wobble easily if touched anything on the desk. These had by fr the biggest imapct. This is my first review on amazon in years - just needed to share this is great for your unstable desk surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Mala calidad e información engañosa
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. En la descripción del producto juraba que el pegamento era suficiente fuerte como para que no se despegara de tus muebles. Es información engañosa y si se despega fácilmente, sin siquiera un esfuerzo alguno
buena opción para evitar que la cabecera se este moviendo por la separación con la pared y la patas de la cabecera
Works really well. Super easy installation. If you look at the measurements, this will keep ur headboard decently away from the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Happy with the products! Buying 2 more for another bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Makes the bed steady!! Works on rounded frames as well
reviews.reviewText: Really useful. I was a bit worried since my bed frame is metal and rounded. But it worked well!!! My bed is super steady and not making noise at all
